### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    username VARCHAR(255),
    level INT,
    currency_balance DECIMAL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 10 WHERE username = 'john_doe';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    username VARCHAR(255),
    level INT,
    currency_balance DECIMAL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_profiles SET currency_balance = currency_balance + 50 WHERE level >= 5;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    username VARCHAR(255),
    level INT,
    currency_balance DECIMAL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_profiles SET currency_balance = currency_balance - 25 WHERE username = 'jane_smith' AND level < 10;
